Loneliness: We are so lonely in life that we must ask ourselves if the loneliness of dying is not a symbol of our human existence.

As far as I am concerned, I resign from humanity. I no longer want to be, nor can still be, a man. What should I do?Work for a social and political system, make a girl miserable? Hunt for weaknesses in philosophical systems, fightfor moral and esthetic ideals? Itâ€™s all too little. I renounce my humanity even though I may find myself alone.But am I not already alone in this world from which I no longer expect anything?
